String address = "jms:jndi:dynamicQueues/test.soap.jmstransport.queue?jndiInitialContextFactory=" + "org.apache.activemq.jndi.ActiveMQInitialContextFactory&jndiConnectionFactoryName=" + "ConnectionFactory&jndiURL=vm://localhost".     endpoint = Endpoint.publish(address, implementor). }
